title: How to make a full fledged REST API with Django OAuth Toolkit
summary: World is going mobile and the need of a backend talking with your apps is getting more and more important. What if I told you writing REST APIs in Python is so easy you don't need to be a backend expert? Take generous tablespoons of Django, mix thoroughly with Django REST Framework and dust with Django OAuth Toolkit to bake the perfect API in minutes.
